overlay.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to cover or be on top of something
overlay.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: The wood is overlaid with silver.
overlay.translation[0].definitions[1].de: if one quality, sound etc overlays another, it is added to it and is often stronger or more noticeable
overlay.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: The roar of the engines was overlaid by a loud banging.
overlay.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: the brass fire surround with its decorative overlay
overlay.translation[1].definitions[1].de: a transparent sheet with a picture or drawing on it which is put on top of another picture to change it
overlay.translation[1].definitions[2].ex: sad stories with an overlay of humour
